name: CheatSheet
desc: Display a cheat sheet of keyboard shortcuts when modifier keys are held.

name: Collage
desc: Clipboard manager with customizable menu for utilities.

name: Readline
desc: Emacs/readline-style keybindings for text editing across macOS apps.

name: SlowQ
desc: Require holding Command+Q for a delay before quitting apps, preventing accidental closes.

name: WinMan
desc: Grid-based window management with automatic cascading for overlapping windows.
